name: Daily Bollinger-RSI Mean Reversion
description: Intermediate mean-reverting equity strategy on daily bars. Long when price closes below the 20-day lower Bollinger Band and RSI(14) < 30; short when price closes above the upper band and RSI(14) > 70. Exits at middle band, 1.5 % trailing stop, or 2.25 % take-profit (≈1 : 1.5 RR). Position size limited to 2 % of equity.
